info.title: odmObject temperature

temperature.desc:
This odmObject describes a sensed or actuated Temperature value.
The Property "temperature" describes the current value measured. The unit of measurement for the "temperature" value is in Celcius.
 When the Property "range" is omitted the default is +/- MAXINT.
temperature.name: temperature

range.desc: applies to the range of allowed values of temperature
range.name: range
